example.text: The Chinese Communist Party must be held accountable for its longstanding, horrific human rights violations. I helped introduce a bipartisan bill to sanction President Xi’s inner circle and send a strong message that the US condemns these atrocities. [[url]]

We must ensure veterans can live their lives to the fullest after their service, especially those who were injured or disabled. [[user]] and I introduced a bipartisan bill to ensure disabled veterans can modify their homes to fit their needs. [[url]]

Measures to Combat Drug Trafficking Bipartisan legislation that I introduced alongside Congressman Newhouse extended emergency measures to address trafficking of fentanyl analogues through December 31, 2024 was also included in the package. This legislation will ensure that law enforcement retains the tools they need to seize fentanyl-related substances and combat drug trafficking.

We must ensure veterans can live their lives to the fullest after their service, especially those who were injured or disabled. [[user]] and I introduced a bipartisan bill to ensure disabled veterans can modify their homes to fit their needs. [[url]]

Advancing American Competitiveness On Tuesday I voted to create a Select Committee on Strategic Competition between the United States and the Communist Party of China. As seen with the CHIPS and Science Act and my Homeland Procurement Reform Act , key investments in American manufacturing continue to bolster our global competitiveness, strengthen national security and create good-paying jobs in the US This committee will help strengthen American innovation, manufacturing, and research and development to further grow our economy.
